EmailTemplate.name: Post Event Attendee Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: So, how'd we do?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!IAVAEvent_Attendee__c.Event_Attendee_s_First_Name__c}!
Thank you for RSVPing to {!IAVAEvent_Attendee__c.Event_Name__c}, our recent VetTogether near you! We hope you were able to join us! We'd just like to get a little feedback and hear about your thoughts for future events. Even if you weren't able to join, we'd love to hear your ideas!
Please take a moment to fill out this quick survey, https://iava.getfeedback.com/r/6U7cn8rc?IAVAEvent_Attendee__c={!IAVAEvent_Attendee__c.Id}.
Thank you and we look forward to hearing about your experience!
Best,
Anthony Pike USMC Veteran Chief Programs Officer Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA)
